content.text: Hello there! What do you like to do for fun?

My name is [name] and I am from [city].  I am a 25 year old, single, professional. I enjoy reading, writing, and spending time with my friends and family. I have a collie named Bailey. What about you?

Hi! My name is [name] and I live in [city]. I am also 25 years old and single. I like to watch movies, go out to eat, and spend time with my dog. I am also a big fan of British television shows and movies.
Oh that's cool! What are some of your favorite British TV shows?
I really like Doctor Who, Sherlock, and The IT Crowd. What about you?
I love Doctor Who! I also like Sherlock and The Office.
I have been watching Doctor Who since I was a kid. It's my favorite show.
Me too! I've been watching it since I was a teenager.
I'm glad to meet someone else who likes Doctor Who. It's not a very popular show here in the US.
It's not very popular in my country either. I'm glad I found a friend who likes it.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
I agree. What other interests do you have?
I also like to read and write. I am a big fan of science fiction and fantasy novels.
I love to read too! I read a lot of different genres, but my favorite is mystery.
I like mystery novels too. I also like historical fiction and thrillers.
I love historical fiction! It's so interesting to learn about different time periods.
Me too! It's a great way to learn about the past.
I agree. I think it's important to learn about history so we can avoid repeating the same mistakes.
I agree. History is important so we can understand the present and the future.
I think so too. It's important to learn from the past so we can make the future better.
I agree. We should all learn from the past and try to make the future better.
